今.definition: now; the present time; current; contemporary; this (day, year etc)

今不如昔.definition: things are not as good as they used to be

今古文.definition: Former Han dynasty study or rewriting of classical texts such as the Confucian six classics 六經|六经[Liu4 jing1]

今後.definition: hereafter; henceforth; in the future; from now on

今文經.definition: Former Han dynasty school of Confucian scholars

今文經學.definition: Former Han dynasty school of Confucian scholars

今日事今日畢.pinyin: jīn rì shì jīn rì bì
今日事今日畢.definition: never put off until tomorrow what you can do today (idiom)

今昔.definition: past and present; yesterday and today

今朝有酒今朝醉.pinyin: jīn zhāo yǒu jiǔ jīn zhāo zuì
今朝有酒今朝醉.definition: to live in the moment (idiom); to live every day as if it were one's last; to enjoy while one can

今次.definition: this; the present (meeting etc); this time; this once

今譯.definition: modern language version; modern translation; contemporary translation

今非昔比.definition: (idiom) things are very different now; times have changed

今音.definition: modern (i.e. not ancient) pronunciation of a Chinese character

今體詩.definition: same as 近體詩|近体诗[jin4 ti3 shi1]
